title: Hi, I bought a Boya MM1 external microphone to connect to my Google Pixel 2XL but it doesn't work. I
content:
Hi, I bought a Boya MM1 external microphone with the USB Type C to audio dongle to connect to my Google Pixel 2XL but it doesn't work. I tried connecting Boya to my iPad, iPhone and computer and they worked. I tried connecting using my headset with the USB Type C to audio dongle and it works too. So, Boya MM1 has selectively worked for everything except my phone?

Has anyone encounter this issue or was my Google Pixel 2XL too old for Boya MM1? 

Can someone help?
